title: Cannot login to TamshaiAI app
description: I'm unable to login to the TamshaiAI desktop application. Getting 'Invalid credentials' error even though I'm using the correct password.

title: Slow query performance on HR data
description: Queries about employee data are taking 30+ seconds to return results. This seems unusually slow.

title: Add new user to Finance team
description: Please create account for new hire Sarah Martinez (sarah.martinez@tamshai-playground.local) with finance-read role.
resolution: User account created and granted finance-read role

title: Request access to Sales CRM data
description: I need access to the Sales MCP server to view customer opportunity pipeline for Q1 planning.
resolution: Denied - user role (manager) does not require sales data access

title: Claude AI returns incomplete results
description: When querying 'List all employees in Engineering', the AI response says 'showing 50 of 50+ results' but I need to see all 75 engineers.

title: TOTP setup instructions needed
description: I received email about required TOTP setup but the link doesn't work. Can you send new instructions?
resolution: Sent new TOTP setup link via secure email

title: Budget report export failing
description: Trying to export Q4 2024 budget report but getting 500 error. Urgent - need for board meeting tomorrow.

title: Feature request: Dark mode for desktop app
description: Would love to have a dark mode option in the TamshaiAI Windows app for late-night work sessions.

title: Executive dashboard not loading
description: Eve Thompson's executive dashboard shows blank screen. Other users report working fine.

title: Password reset not working
description: Clicked 'Forgot Password' but never received reset email. Checked spam folder.
resolution: Email server issue fixed, reset link sent

title: How to set up TOTP (Two-Factor Authentication)
content:
To enable TOTP for your Tamshai account:
1. Login to Keycloak at http://auth.tamshai-playground.local
2. Click Account Console
3. Navigate to Account Security > Two-Factor Authentication
4. Click Configure Authenticator
5. Scan QR code with authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, 1Password)
6. Enter 6-digit code to verify

Required for all users as of Jan 1, 2026.

title: Understanding AI response truncation warnings
content:
If you see 'TRUNCATION WARNING: Only 50 of 50+ records returned', the AI was limited to viewing the first 50 results from the database.

To get complete results:
1. Refine your query to be more specific (filter by department, date range, etc.)
2. Ask the AI to paginate through results (e.g., 'Show next 50 employees')
3. Request a data export via Support ticket for large datasets

This limit prevents timeouts and ensures fast AI responses.

title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) Explained
content:
Tamshai uses hierarchical roles to control data access:

Executive: Full read access to all departments
Department Leads (hr-write, finance-write, etc.): Read/write access to their department
Department Users (hr-read, finance-read, etc.): Read-only access to their department
Managers: Access to direct reports only
Employees: Access to own data only
Interns: Minimal access

To request role changes, submit a Support ticket with business justification.

title: TamshaiAI Desktop App Installation
content:
Windows Installation:
1. Download TamshaiAI-Setup-1.0.0.exe from internal portal
2. Run installer (requires admin rights)
3. Launch app from Start Menu
4. Login with corporate credentials (username@tamshai-playground.local)
5. Complete TOTP setup if prompted

System Requirements:
- Windows 10 (1809+) or Windows 11
- 4GB RAM minimum (8GB recommended)
- 500MB disk space
- Internet connection for AI queries

title: How to query HR data with AI
content:
Example HR queries:
- 'How many employees are in Engineering?'
- 'List all managers in the Sales department'
- 'Show me employees hired in the last 6 months'
- 'What is the average salary in Finance?' (requires hr-write role)

Tips:
- Be specific to reduce truncation (e.g., filter by department)
- HR-read role can see employee names, departments, titles
- HR-write role can see salaries, performance reviews
- Managers can only see their direct reports

title: Finance Dashboard and Budget Queries
content:
Accessing Finance Data:

Dashboard Features:
- Total Budget: Shows FY2026 allocated budget across all departments
- Total Spent: Year-to-date spending from invoices
- Pending Approvals: Expense reports awaiting manager approval
- Budget Utilization: Percentage of budget consumed

AI Query Examples:
- 'Show me IT department budget for FY2026'
- 'List all pending invoices for Engineering'
- 'What is our Q1 2026 spending compared to budget?'
- 'Show expense reports submitted by [employee name]'

Note: Requires finance-read role or higher. Finance-write role needed for approvals.

title: Sales CRM: Managing Opportunities and Pipeline
content:
Sales Dashboard Overview:

Pipeline Stages:
1. Qualification: Initial lead assessment
2. Discovery: Understanding customer needs
3. Proposal: Sending pricing and solutions
4. Negotiation: Contract terms discussion
5. Closed Won/Lost: Final deal outcome

Common AI Queries:
- 'Show me all deals in negotiation stage'
- 'What is our Q1 2026 closed revenue?'
- 'List opportunities closing this month'
- 'Show pipeline for [sales rep name]'

Closing a Deal:
- Update stage to 'Closed Won' or 'Closed Lost'
- Enter actual close date
- Add final notes about outcome
- AI will calculate revenue and update forecasts

Requires: sales-read role (view), sales-write role (edit)

title: Creating and Managing Support Tickets
content:
How to Create a Support Ticket:

1. Navigate to Support Dashboard
2. Click 'New Ticket' button
3. Fill in required fields:
   - Title: Brief description (< 100 chars)
   - Description: Detailed explanation
   - Priority: critical/high/medium/low
   - Tags: Add relevant keywords

4. Submit and await assignment

Priority Guidelines:
- Critical: System down, data loss, security breach
- High: Major feature broken, blocking work
- Medium: Minor bugs, enhancement requests
- Low: Questions, documentation, feature ideas

Tracking Your Tickets:
- View 'My Tickets' tab for your submissions
- Check 'Assigned to Me' if you're support staff
- Filter by status: open/in_progress/resolved/closed

AI Query Examples:
- 'Show my open tickets'
- 'List all critical priority tickets'
- 'What tickets were closed this week?'

title: Troubleshooting Login and Authentication Issues
content:
Common Login Problems:

1. 'Invalid Credentials' Error:
   - Verify username format: firstname.lastname
   - Check Caps Lock is OFF
   - Ensure TOTP code is current (refreshes every 30 seconds)
   - Try password reset if needed

2. TOTP Code Not Working:
   - Wait for code to refresh (countdown timer)
   - Verify device time is synced (critical for TOTP)
   - Re-scan QR code if codes consistently fail

3. Account Locked:
   - After 5 failed attempts, account locks for 10 minutes
   - Contact Support to unlock immediately
   - Review password manager for correct credentials

4. Password Reset Link Expired:
   - Links valid for 1 hour only
   - Request new reset link
   - Check spam folder for reset emails

Still having issues? Submit ticket with tag 'authentication' for priority support.

title: Data Export and Reporting
content:
Exporting Large Datasets:

When to Export:
- AI truncation warnings (50+ records)
- Need for offline analysis
- Compliance/audit requirements
- Bulk data operations

Export Methods:

1. Via AI (Small datasets < 100 rows):
   - Ask: 'Export employee list to CSV'
   - AI will provide download link

2. Via Department Dashboards:
   - Navigate to relevant dashboard (Finance/HR/Sales)
   - Click 'Export' button on data tables
   - Choose format: CSV, Excel, or PDF

3. Via Support Ticket (Large datasets):
   - For exports > 1000 rows
   - Specify: data needed, date range, format
   - Support will generate secure download link

Data Security:
- All exports encrypted
- Require role permissions (e.g., hr-write for salary data)
- Download links expire after 24 hours
- Export activity logged for compliance

title: Understanding $NaN in Finance Dashboard
content:
Troubleshooting $NaN (Not a Number) Values:

Common Causes:
1. Missing fiscal year data in database
2. Date filter mismatches (querying FY2026 when only FY2025 exists)
3. Invalid budget category references
4. Database sync issues

Quick Fixes:
- Refresh the dashboard (F5)
- Change fiscal year filter to available years
- Clear browser cache

If Problem Persists:
1. Submit Support ticket with:
   - Screenshot showing $NaN
   - Fiscal year being viewed
   - User role (finance-read/write)
2. Tag ticket with 'finance' and 'bug'
3. Include browser and app version

Known Issues:
- Q1 2026 data may not be fully seeded yet
- Budget reports for future years show $NaN until populated

Workaround: Use previous fiscal year data while current year is being set up.

title: Sales Pipeline Best Practices
content:
Optimizing Your Sales Process:

1. Lead Qualification:
   - Assess budget, authority, need, timeline (BANT)
   - Move to Discovery only after qualification
   - Set expected close date realistically

2. Discovery Stage:
   - Document customer pain points
   - Identify decision makers
   - Log all activities (calls, demos, meetings)
   - Minimum 2-3 touchpoints before proposal

3. Proposal Stage:
   - Customize proposal to customer needs
   - Set probability 40-60% based on engagement
   - Follow up within 48 hours of sending

4. Negotiation Stage:
   - Update probability to 60-80%
   - Document all contract terms
   - Loop in legal/finance as needed

5. Closing:
   - Enter actual close date immediately
   - Update deal value if changed during negotiation
   - Add post-mortem notes (win/loss reasons)

AI Can Help:
- 'Show me stale deals in discovery stage'
- 'List opportunities with no activity this month'
- 'Calculate weighted pipeline for Q1 2026'
